```json
{
  "contents": "using Final_Test_Hybrid.Services.OpcUa.Interface;\nusing Microsoft.Extensions.Logging;\nusing Microsoft.Extensions.Options;\nusing Opc.Ua;\nusing Opc.Ua.Client;\n\nnamespace Final_Test_Hybrid.Services.OpcUa\n{\n    public class OpcUaConnectionService(\n        ILogger&lt;OpcUaConnectionService&gt; logger,\n        IOptions&lt;OpcUaSettings&gt; settings,\n        ISessionFactory sessionFactory)\n        : IOpcUaConnectionService\n    {\n        public bool IsConnected =&gt; Session?.Connected == true;\n        public Session? Session { get; private set; }\n        public event EventHandler&lt;bool&gt;? ConnectionChanged;\n        private readonly OpcUaSettings _settings = settings.Value;\n        private readonly SemaphoreSlim _sessionLock = new(1, 1);\n        private readonly Lock _reconnectLock = new();\n        private SessionReconnectHandler? _reconnectHandler;\n        private Opc.Ua.ApplicationConfiguration? _appConfig;\n        private CancellationTokenSource? _cts;\n        private Task? _connectLoopTask;\n        private bool _lastConnectionState;\n\n        public async Task StartAsync(CancellationToken ct = default)\n        {\n            if (_connectLoopTask is { IsCompleted: false })\n            {\n                return;\n            }\n            _cts = CancellationTokenSource.CreateLinkedTokenSource(ct);\n            await InitializeApplicationConfigAsync();\n            _connectLoopTask = ConnectLoopAsync(_cts.Token);\n        }\n\n        public async Task StopAsync()\n        {\n            await CancelConnectionAsync();\n            DisposeReconnectHandler();\n            await _sessionLock.WaitAsync();\n            try\n            {\n                await CloseSessionAsync();\n            }\n            finally\n            {\n                _sessionLock.Release();\n            }\n            NotifyConnectionChanged(false);\n        }\n\n        public async ValueTask DisposeAsync()\n        {\n            await StopAsync();\n            _sessionLock.Dispose();\n        }\n\n        private async Task InitializeApplicationConfigAsync()\n        {\n            _appConfig = new Opc.Ua.ApplicationConfiguration\n            {\n                ApplicationName = _settings.ApplicationName,\n                ApplicationUri = $\"urn:{_settings.ApplicationName}\",\n                ApplicationType = ApplicationType.Client,\n                SecurityConfiguration = new SecurityConfiguration\n                {\n                    ApplicationCertificate = new CertificateIdentifier(),\n                    AutoAcceptUntrustedCertificates = true\n                },\n                ClientConfiguration = new ClientConfiguration\n                {\n                    DefaultSessionTimeout = _settings.SessionTimeoutMs\n                },\n                TransportConfigurations = [],\n                TransportQuotas = new TransportQuotas { OperationTimeout = _settings.OperationTimeoutMs }\n            };\n            await _appConfig.ValidateAsync(ApplicationType.Client);\n        }\n\n        private async Task ConnectLoopAsync(CancellationToken ct)\n        {\n            try\n            {\n                while (!ct.IsCancellationRequested)\n                {\n                    await TryReconnectIfNeededAsync(ct);\n                    await Task.Delay(_settings.ReconnectIntervalMs, ct);\n                }\n            }\n            catch (OperationCanceledException)\n            {\n                logger.LogInformation(\"Connection loop canceled\");\n            }\n            catch (Exception ex)\n            {\n                logger.LogError(ex, \"Connection loop failed\");\n            }\n        }\n\n        private async Task TryReconnectIfNeededAsync(CancellationToken ct)\n        {\n            if (IsReconnectingOrConnected())\n            {\n                return;\n            }\n            await TryConnectAsync(ct);\n        }\n\n        private bool IsReconnectingOrConnected()\n        {\n            lock (_reconnectLock)\n            {\n                return _reconnectHandler != null || Session is { Connected: true };\n            }\n        }\n\n        private async Task TryConnectAsync(CancellationToken ct)\n        {\n            await _sessionLock.WaitAsync(ct);\n            try\n            {\n                DisposeReconnectHandler();\n                await CloseSessionAsync();\n                logger.LogInformation(\"Connecting to OPC UA server: {Endpoint}\", _settings.EndpointUrl);\n                var endpoint = await CoreClientUtils.SelectEndpointAsync(_appConfig, _settings.EndpointUrl, useSecurity: false, ct: ct);\n                var configEndpoint = new ConfiguredEndpoint(null, endpoint);\n                Session = await CreateSessionAsync(configEndpoint, ct);\n                Session.KeepAlive += OnSessionKeepAlive;\n                logger.LogInformation(\"Connected to OPC UA server\");\n                NotifyConnectionChanged(true);\n            }\n            catch (OperationCanceledException)\n            {\n                // Cancellation is expected during shutdown\n            }\n            catch (Exception ex)\n            {\n                logger.LogError(ex, \"Failed to connect to OPC UA server\");\n                NotifyConnectionChanged(false);\n            }\n            finally\n            {\n                _sessionLock.Release();\n            }\n        }\n\n        private void OnSessionKeepAlive(ISession session, KeepAliveEventArgs e)\n        {\n            if (ShouldSkipKeepAlive(e))\n            {\n                return;\n            }\n            logger.LogWarning(\"Connection lost. Status: {Status}\", e.Status);\n            NotifyConnectionChanged(false);\n            StartReconnectIfNeeded();\n        }\n\n        private bool ShouldSkipKeepAlive(KeepAliveEventArgs e)\n        {\n            return e.Status == null || ServiceResult.IsGood(e.Status);\n        }\n\n        private void StartReconnectIfNeeded()\n        {\n            lock (_reconnectLock)\n            {\n                if (_reconnectHandler != null || Session == null)\n                {\n                    return;\n                }\n                logger.LogInformation(\"Reconnecting...\");\n                _reconnectHandler = new SessionReconnectHandler();\n                _reconnectHandler.BeginReconnect(\n                    Session,\n                    _settings.ReconnectIntervalMs,\n                    OnReconnectComplete);\n            }\n        }\n\n        private void OnReconnectComplete(object? sender, EventArgs e)\n        {\n            lock (_reconnectLock)\n            {\n                UpdateSessionIfReconnected();\n                DisposeReconnectHandler();\n            }\n        }\n\n        private void UpdateSessionIfReconnected()\n        {\n            if (_reconnectHandler?.Session == null)\n            {\n                return;\n            }\n            Session?.KeepAlive -= OnSessionKeepAlive;\n            Session = (Session)_reconnectHandler.Session;\n            logger.LogInformation(\"Reconnected to OPC UA server\");\n            Session.KeepAlive += OnSessionKeepAlive;\n            NotifyConnectionChanged(true);\n        }\n\n        private void NotifyConnectionChanged(bool connected)\n        {\n            if (_lastConnectionState == connected)\n            {\n                return;\n            }\n            _lastConnectionState = connected;\n            ConnectionChanged?.Invoke(this, connected);\n        }\n\n        private async Task CancelConnectionAsync()\n        {\n            if (_cts == null)\n            {\n                return;\n            }\n            await _cts.CancelAsync();\n            _cts.Dispose();\n            _cts = null;\n            DisposeReconnectHandler();\n            await WaitConnectLoopAsync();\n        }\n\n        private void DisposeReconnectHandler()\n        {\n            lock (_reconnectLock)\n            {\n                _reconnectHandler?.Dispose();\n                _reconnectHandler = null;\n            }\n        }\n\n        private async Task CloseSessionAsync()\n        {\n            if (Session == null)\n            {\n                return;\n            }\n            Session.KeepAlive -= OnSessionKeepAlive;\n            try\n            {\n                await Session.CloseAsync();\n            }\n            catch (Exception ex)\n            {\n                logger.LogWarning(ex, \"Error closing session\");\n            }\n            Session.Dispose();\n            Session = null;\n        }\n\n        private async Task WaitConnectLoopAsync()\n        {\n            if (_connectLoopTask == null)\n            {\n                return;\n            }\n            try\n            {\n                await _connectLoopTask;\n            }\n            catch (OperationCanceledException)\n            {\n                logger.LogInformation(\"Connection loop canceled\");\n            }\n            _connectLoopTask = null;\n        }\n\n        private async Task&lt;Session&gt; CreateSessionAsync(ConfiguredEndpoint configEndpoint, CancellationToken ct)\n        {\n            var session = await sessionFactory.CreateAsync(\n                _appConfig,\n                configEndpoint,\n                updateBeforeConnect: false,\n                sessionName: _settings.ApplicationName,\n                sessionTimeout: (uint)_settings.SessionTimeoutMs,\n                identity: new UserIdentity(new AnonymousIdentityToken()),\n                preferredLocales: null,\n                ct).ConfigureAwait(false);\n            return (Session)session;\n        }\n    }\n}\n",
  "totalLinesInFile": 287
}
```

```json
{
  "contents": "using Final_Test_Hybrid.Services.OpcUa.Interface;\nusing Microsoft.Extensions.Logging;\nusing Opc.Ua;\n\nnamespace Final_Test_Hybrid.Services.OpcUa\n{\n    public class OpcUaReadWriteService(\n        IOpcUaConnectionService connection,\n        ILogger&lt;OpcUaReadWriteService&gt; logger)\n        : IOpcUaReadWriteService\n    {\n        public async Task&lt;T?&gt; ReadNodeAsync&lt;T&gt;(string nodeId, CancellationToken ct = default)\n        {\n            var session = connection.Session;\n            if (session is not { Connected: true })\n            {\n                logger.LogWarning(\"Cannot read node {NodeId}: Session not connected\", nodeId);\n                return default;\n            }\n            try\n            {\n                var node = new NodeId(nodeId);\n                var value = await session.ReadValueAsync(node, ct);\n                return GetValueOrDefault&lt;T&gt;(nodeId, value);\n            }\n            catch (Exception ex)\n            {\n                logger.LogError(ex, \"Failed to read node {NodeId}\", nodeId);\n                return default;\n            }\n        }\n\n        private T? GetValueOrDefault&lt;T&gt;(string nodeId, DataValue value)\n        {\n            if (StatusCode.IsBad(value.StatusCode))\n            {\n                logger.LogWarning(\"Read node {NodeId} returned bad status {Status}\", nodeId, value.StatusCode);\n                return default;\n            }\n            if (value.Value is T typedValue)\n            {\n                return typedValue;\n            }\n            logger.LogWarning(\"Cannot cast value from node {NodeId} to type {Type}\", nodeId, typeof(T).Name);\n            return default;\n        }\n\n        public async Task WriteNodeAsync&lt;T&gt;(string nodeId, T value, CancellationToken ct = default)\n        {\n            var session = connection.Session;\n            if (session is not { Connected: true })\n            {\n                logger.LogWarning(\"Cannot write node {NodeId}: Session not connected\", nodeId);\n                return;\n            }\n            try\n            {\n                var node = new NodeId(nodeId);\n                var writeValue = CreateWriteValue(node, value);\n                var request = new WriteValueCollection { writeValue };\n                var response = await session.WriteAsync(null, request, ct);\n                LogWriteResult(nodeId, response.Results);\n            }\n            catch (Exception ex)\n            {\n                logger.LogError(ex, \"Failed to write node {NodeId}\", nodeId);\n            }\n        }\n\n        private void LogWriteResult(string nodeId, StatusCodeCollection? results)\n        {\n            if (results == null || results.Count == 0)\n            {\n                logger.LogWarning(\"Write node {NodeId}: empty results\", nodeId);\n                return;\n            }\n            LogBadStatusIfNeeded(nodeId, results[0]);\n        }\n\n        private void LogBadStatusIfNeeded(string nodeId, StatusCode status)\n        {\n            if (StatusCode.IsBad(status))\n            {\n                logger.LogWarning(\"Write node {NodeId} failed with status {Status}\", nodeId, status);\n            }\n        }\n\n        private WriteValue CreateWriteValue&lt;T&gt;(NodeId node, T value)\n        {\n            return new WriteValue\n            {\n                NodeId = node,\n                AttributeId = Attributes.Value,\n                Value = new DataValue(new Variant(value))\n            };\n        }\n    }\n}",
  "totalLinesInFile": 98
}
```

Result:

```json
{
  "contents": "using System.Collections.Concurrent;\nusing Final_Test_Hybrid.Services.OpcUa.Interface;\nusing Microsoft.Extensions.Logging;\nusing Microsoft.Extensions.Options;\nusing Opc.Ua;\nusing Opc.Ua.Client;\n\nnamespace Final_Test_Hybrid.Services.OpcUa\n{\n    public class OpcUaSubscriptionService(\n        IOpcUaConnectionService connectionService,\n        IOptions&lt;OpcUaSettings&gt; settings,\n        ILogger&lt;OpcUaSubscriptionService&gt; logger) : IOpcUaSubscriptionService\n    {\n        private readonly OpcUaSettings _settings = settings.Value;\n        private readonly ConcurrentDictionary&lt;string, Subscription&gt; _subscriptions = new();\n        private readonly ConcurrentDictionary&lt;string, Action&lt;object?&gt;&gt; _callbacks = new();\n        private readonly Lock _connectionEventsLock = new();\n        private readonly SemaphoreSlim _connectionChangeGate = new(1, 1);\n        private bool _connectionEventsAttached;\n\n        public OpcUaSubscriptionService(\n            IOpcUaConnectionService connectionService,\n            IOptions&lt;OpcUaSettings&gt; settings,\n            ILogger&lt;OpcUaSubscriptionService&gt; logger,\n            bool subscribeToConnection = true)\n            : this(connectionService, settings, logger)\n        {\n            if (subscribeToConnection)\n            {\n                connectionService.ConnectionChanged += OnConnectionChanged;\n                _connectionEventsAttached = true;\n            }\n        }\n\n        public async Task SubscribeAsync(string nodeId, Action&lt;object?&gt; callback)\n        {\n            EnsureConnectionEventsAttached();\n            _callbacks[nodeId] = callback;\n            var session = connectionService.Session;\n            if (session is not { Connected: true })\n            {\n                return;\n            }\n            await RemoveExistingSubscriptionAsync(nodeId);\n            try\n            {\n                var subscription = CreateSubscription(session);\n                var monitoredItem = CreateMonitoredItem(nodeId, callback, subscription);\n                await AddSubscriptionToSessionAsync(session, subscription, monitoredItem);\n                _subscriptions[nodeId] = subscription;\n                logger.LogInformation(\"Subscribed to node {NodeId}\", nodeId);\n            }\n            catch (Exception ex)\n            {\n                logger.LogError(ex, \"Failed to subscribe to node {NodeId}\", nodeId);\n            }\n        }\n\n        public async Task UnsubscribeAsync(string nodeId)\n        {\n            _callbacks.TryRemove(nodeId, out _);\n            if (!_subscriptions.TryRemove(nodeId, out var subscription))\n            {\n                return;\n            }\n            try\n            {\n                await RemoveSubscriptionFromSessionAsync(subscription);\n                subscription.Dispose();\n                logger.LogInformation(\"Unsubscribed from node {NodeId}\", nodeId);\n            }\n            catch (Exception ex)\n            {\n                logger.LogError(ex, \"Failed to unsubscribe from node {NodeId}\", nodeId);\n            }\n        }\n\n        public async ValueTask DisposeAsync()\n        {\n            DetachConnectionEvents();\n            foreach (var subscription in _subscriptions.Values.ToArray())\n            {\n                await SafeRemoveSubscriptionAsync(subscription);\n            }\n            _subscriptions.Clear();\n            _callbacks.Clear();\n            _connectionChangeGate.Dispose();\n        }\n\n        private async Task SafeRemoveSubscriptionAsync(Subscription subscription)\n        {\n            try\n            {\n                await RemoveSubscriptionFromSessionAsync(subscription);\n                subscription.Dispose();\n            }\n            catch (Exception ex)\n            {\n                logger.LogError(ex, \"Error disposing subscription\");\n            }\n        }\n\n        private Subscription CreateSubscription(Session session)\n        {\n            return new Subscription(session.DefaultSubscription)\n            {\n                PublishingInterval = _settings.PublishingIntervalMs\n            };\n        }\n\n        private MonitoredItem CreateMonitoredItem(string nodeId, Action&lt;object?&gt; callback, Subscription subscription)\n        {\n            var monitoredItem = new MonitoredItem(subscription.DefaultItem)\n            {\n                StartNodeId = new NodeId(nodeId),\n                AttributeId = Attributes.Value\n            };\n            monitoredItem.Notification += (item, e) =&gt;\n            {\n                try\n                {\n                    if (e.NotificationValue is not MonitoredItemNotification notification)\n                    {\n                        return;\n                    }\n                    callback(notification.Value.Value);\n                }\n                catch (Exception ex)\n                {\n                    logger.LogError(ex, \"Callback error for node {NodeId}\", nodeId);\n                }\n            };\n            return monitoredItem;\n        }\n\n        private async Task AddSubscriptionToSessionAsync(Session session, Subscription subscription, MonitoredItem monitoredItem)\n        {\n            subscription.AddItem(monitoredItem);\n            session.AddSubscription(subscription);\n            try\n            {\n                await subscription.CreateAsync();\n            }\n            catch\n            {\n                await session.RemoveSubscriptionAsync(subscription);\n                subscription.Dispose();\n                throw;\n            }\n        }\n\n        private async Task RemoveSubscriptionFromSessionAsync(Subscription subscription)\n        {\n            if (subscription.Session is not { Connected: true } session)\n            {\n                return;\n            }\n            await subscription.DeleteAsync(true);\n            await session.RemoveSubscriptionAsync(subscription);\n        }\n\n        private async Task RemoveExistingSubscriptionAsync(string nodeId)\n        {\n            if (!_subscriptions.TryGetValue(nodeId, out var existing))\n            {\n                return;\n            }\n            try\n            {\n                await RemoveSubscriptionFromSessionAsync(existing);\n                existing.Dispose();\n                _subscriptions.TryRemove(nodeId, out _);\n            }\n            catch (Exception ex)\n            {\n                logger.LogError(ex, \"Failed to remove existing subscription for node {NodeId}\", nodeId);\n            }\n        }\n\n        private void EnsureConnectionEventsAttached()\n        {\n            lock (_connectionEventsLock)\n            {\n                if (_connectionEventsAttached)\n                {\n                    return;\n                }\n                connectionService.ConnectionChanged += OnConnectionChanged;\n                _connectionEventsAttached = true;\n            }\n        }\n\n        private void DetachConnectionEvents()\n        {\n            lock (_connectionEventsLock)\n            {\n                if (!_connectionEventsAttached)\n                {\n                    return;\n                }\n                connectionService.ConnectionChanged -= OnConnectionChanged;\n                _connectionEventsAttached = false;\n            }\n        }\n\n        private async void OnConnectionChanged(object? sender, bool connected)\n        {\n            try\n            {\n                await HandleConnectionChangeAsync(connected);\n            }\n            catch (Exception ex)\n            {\n                logger.LogError(ex, \"Unhandled error in connection change handler\");\n            }\n        }\n\n        private async Task HandleConnectionChangeAsync(bool connected)\n        {\n            await _connectionChangeGate.WaitAsync();\n            try\n            {\n                await ProcessConnectionStateAsync(connected);\n            }\n            catch (Exception ex)\n            {\n                logger.LogError(ex, \"Error handling connection change (connected={Connected})\", connected);\n            }\n            finally\n            {\n                _connectionChangeGate.Release();\n            }\n        }\n\n        private async Task ProcessConnectionStateAsync(bool connected)\n        {\n            if (connected)\n            {\n                await ResubscribeAllAsync();\n                return;\n            }\n            await DropAllSubscriptionsAsync();\n        }\n\n        private async Task ResubscribeAllAsync()\n        {\n            if (connectionService.Session is not { Connected: true } session)\n            {\n                return;\n            }\n            foreach (var kvp in _callbacks.ToArray())\n            {\n                await SubscribeInternalAsync(kvp.Key, kvp.Value, session);\n            }\n        }\n\n        private async Task SubscribeInternalAsync(string nodeId, Action&lt;object?&gt; callback, Session session)\n        {\n            await RemoveExistingSubscriptionAsync(nodeId);\n            var subscription = CreateSubscription(session);\n            var monitoredItem = CreateMonitoredItem(nodeId, callback, subscription);\n            try\n            {\n                await AddSubscriptionToSessionAsync(session, subscription, monitoredItem);\n                _subscriptions[nodeId] = subscription;\n                logger.LogInformation(\"Subscribed to node {NodeId}\", nodeId);\n            }\n            catch (Exception ex)\n            {\n                logger.LogError(ex, \"Failed to subscribe to node {NodeId}\", nodeId);\n            }\n        }\n\n        private async Task DropAllSubscriptionsAsync()\n        {\n            foreach (var subscription in _subscriptions.Values.ToArray())\n            {\n                await SafeRemoveSubscriptionAsync(subscription);\n            }\n            _subscriptions.Clear();\n        }\n    }\n}",
  "totalLinesInFile": 284
}
```
Status: **completed**

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
Let me analyze the code for stability, critical errors, and memory leaks. I'll go through each service:

## OpcUaConnectionService Analysis

### Good practices:
1. Uses `SemaphoreSlim` for session lock - proper async locking
2. Implements `IAsyncDisposable` with proper disposal
3. Handles reconnection logic with `SessionReconnectHandler`
4. Uses `CancellationToken` properly
5. Unsubscribes from events before disposing session
6. Uses `ConfigureAwait(false)` in `CreateSessionAsync`

### Potential issues:
1. **Line 19-20**: `_sessionLock = new(1, 1)` - SemaphoreSlim is disposed in `DisposeAsync()`, but there's no check for double-dispose. However, this isn't a critical issue.

2. **Line 33**: `_cts = CancellationTokenSource.CreateLinkedTokenSource(ct)` - Creates a new CTS, but if `StartAsync` is called again before `StopAsync`, the old CTS could be orphaned. However, line 29-32 prevents this.

3. **Line 127**: `CoreClientUtils.SelectEndpointAsync` - if this throws, it's caught properly

4. **Race condition potential**: In `OnReconnectComplete` (line 182-189), there's a `lock (_reconnectLock)` around `UpdateSessionIfReconnected` and `DisposeReconnectHandler`. The session is updated inside the lock, which is good.

5. **Event handler leak prevention**: Line 130 (`Session.KeepAlive += OnSessionKeepAlive`) is properly paired with line 197 (`Session?.KeepAlive -= OnSessionKeepAlive`) and line 242 (`Session.KeepAlive -= OnSessionKeepAlive`).

### Minor issues:
- The `Lock` type on line 20 is used with `_reconnectLock`. This is the new C# 13 Lock type which is fine.
 
## OpcUaReadWriteService Analysis

The service demonstrates a lightweight, stateless approach to OPC UA read and write operations. Its design focuses on simplicity and error resilience. The implementation includes robust null checking and comprehensive error handling through try-catch mechanisms. 

Key observations include:
- Stateless nature prevents resource management complexities
- Effective use of CancellationToken for operation control
- Implicit error handling protects against potential session disconnection scenarios

## OpcUaSubscriptionService Analysis

I'll continue analyzing the service's good practices and potential considerations in the next part of the review.

The service leverages thread-safe collections and implements advanced concurrency patterns. It demonstrates careful management of event subscriptions and connection handling. The use of `ConcurrentDictionary` ensures safe multi-threaded access, while the connection change gate prevents race conditions during state transitions.

Careful attention is needed around the `async void` method, which introduces potential application stability risks if not managed precisely.

The constructor design reveals complexity, with multiple initialization paths that could lead to subtle behavioral differences. The lazy event subscription approach requires careful tracking to ensure proper connection event attachment.

Memory management concerns emerge around monitored item creation, particularly with lambda event handler captures. The potential for event handler leaks depends critically on the underlying OPC UA SDK's disposal mechanisms.

A nuanced race condition appears to be lurking in the implementation, suggesting potential synchronization challenges that require deeper investigation.

The subscription management methods demonstrate defensive coding patterns, with explicit error handling and cleanup strategies to prevent resource leakage and maintain system integrity.

In the `DisposeAsync` method, a potential synchronization hazard exists with the `_connectionChangeGate` semaphore. Disposing the semaphore while an ongoing connection change operation is in progress could trigger unexpected thread synchronization failures, potentially causing `ObjectDisposedException` for waiting threads.

The method attempts to mitigate this risk by first detaching connection events, theoretically preventing new event handlers from entering. However, a race condition remains if an in-flight connection change operation is already executing when disposal begins.</details></think>

- –•–æ—Ä–æ—à–∞—è –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ –æ—à–∏–±–æ–∫ —Å try-catch
- –ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∏ –Ω–∞ `null` –∏ —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å –ø–æ–¥–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏—è

**OpcUaSubscriptionService:**

- Gate (`_connectionChangeGate`) –ø—Ä–µ–¥–æ—Ç–≤—Ä–∞—â–∞–µ—Ç –æ–¥–Ω–æ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—É—é –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫—É —Å–æ–±—ã—Ç–∏–π –ø–æ–¥–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏—è
- –ü—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –æ—Ç–ø–∏—Å–∫–∞ –æ—Ç —Å–æ–±—ã—Ç–∏–π –≤ `DetachConnectionEvents()`

### ‚ö†Ô∏è –ü–æ—Ç–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º—ã

#### 1. **`async void` –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫ —Å–æ–±—ã—Ç–∏—è** (–°—Ä–µ–¥–Ω–∏–π —Ä–∏—Å–∫)

```112:117:Final_Test_Hybrid/Services/OpcUa/OpcUaSubscriptionService.cs
        private async void OnConnectionChanged(object? sender, bool connected)
        {
            try
            {
                await HandleConnectionChangeAsync(connected);
            }
```

`async void` ‚Äî –∞–Ω—Ç–∏–ø–∞—Ç—Ç–µ—Ä–Ω, —Ç.–∫. –∏—Å–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –Ω–µ –º–æ–≥—É—Ç –±—ã—Ç—å –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Ö–≤–∞—á–µ–Ω—ã –≤—ã–∑—ã–≤–∞—é—â–∏–º –∫–æ–¥–æ–º. –•–æ—Ç—è —Ç—É—Ç –µ—Å—Ç—å `try-catch`, —ç—Ç–æ –≤—Å—ë —Ä–∞–≤–Ω–æ —Ä–∏—Å–∫–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω–æ. **–†–µ–∫–æ–º–µ–Ω–¥–∞—Ü–∏—è:** –û—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∏—Ç—å –∫–∞–∫ –µ—Å—Ç—å, –Ω–æ –¥–æ–±–∞–≤–∏—Ç—å –±–æ–ª–µ–µ –¥–µ—Ç–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ –ª–æ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤ `catch`.

#### 2. **–ü–æ—Ç–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –≥–æ–Ω–∫–∞ –≤ `DisposeAsync`** (–°—Ä–µ–¥–Ω–∏–π —Ä–∏—Å–∫)

```79:89:Final_Test_Hybrid/Services/OpcUa/OpcUaSubscriptionService.cs
        public async ValueTask DisposeAsync()
        {
            DetachConnectionEvents();
            foreach (var subscription in _subscriptions.Values.ToArray())
            {
                await SafeRemoveSubscriptionAsync(subscription);
            }
            _subscriptions.Clear();
            _callbacks.Clear();
            _connectionChangeGate.Dispose();
        }
```

–ï—Å–ª–∏ `OnConnectionChanged` —É–∂–µ –≤—ã–ø–æ–ª–Ω—è–µ—Ç—Å—è –∏ –¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏—Ç `_connectionChangeGate`, –≤—ã–∑–æ–≤ `Dispose()` –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç –ø—Ä–∏–≤–µ—Å—Ç–∏ –∫ `ObjectDisposedException`. 

**–ò—Å–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ:**

```csharp
public async ValueTask DisposeAsync()
{
    DetachConnectionEvents();
    
    // –î–æ–∂–¥–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –∑–∞–≤–µ—Ä—à–µ–Ω–∏—è —Ç–µ–∫—É—â–µ–≥–æ –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–∞
    await _connectionChangeGate.WaitAsync();
    try
    {
        foreach (var subscription in _subscriptions.Values.ToArray())
        {
            await SafeRemoveSubscriptionAsync(subscription);
        }
        _subscriptions.Clear();
        _callbacks.Clear();
    }
    finally
    {
        _connectionChangeGate.Release();
        _connectionChangeGate.Dispose();
    }
}
```

#### 3. **–ù–µ—Ç –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∏ –Ω–∞ disposed —Å–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–∏–µ** (–ù–∏–∑–∫–∏–π —Ä–∏—Å–∫)

–í `OpcUaSubscriptionService` –Ω–µ—Ç —Ñ–ª–∞–≥–∞ `_disposed` –¥–ª—è –ø—Ä–µ–¥–æ—Ç–≤—Ä–∞—â–µ–Ω–∏—è –ø–æ–≤—Ç–æ—Ä–Ω—ã—Ö –≤—ã–∑–æ–≤–æ–≤ –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ `DisposeAsync()`.

#### 4. **–ü–æ—Ç–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –≥–æ–Ω–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–∏ —á—Ç–µ–Ω–∏–∏ Session** (–ù–∏–∑–∫–∏–π —Ä–∏—Å–∫)

```14:19:Final_Test_Hybrid/Services/OpcUa/OpcUaReadWriteService.cs
            var session = connection.Session;
            if (session is not { Connected: true })
            {
                logger.LogWarning("Cannot read node {NodeId}: Session not connected", nodeId);
                return default;
            }
```

–ú–µ–∂–¥—É –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–æ–π –∏ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º —Å–µ—Å—Å–∏—è –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç –æ—Ç–∫–ª—é—á–∏—Ç—å—Å—è. –ù–æ —ç—Ç–æ –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è `try-catch`, —Ç–∞–∫ —á—Ç–æ **–Ω–µ –∫—Ä–∏—Ç–∏—á–Ω–æ**.

## –ò—Ç–æ–≥–æ–≤—ã–π –≤–µ—Ä–¥–∏–∫—Ç

| –ö—Ä–∏—Ç–µ—Ä–∏–π | –°—Ç–∞—Ç—É—Å |

| –ö—Ä–∏—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ –æ—à–∏–±–∫–∏ | ‚ùå –ù–µ –æ–±–Ω–∞—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–æ |
| –£—Ç–µ—á–∫–∏ –ø–∞–º—è—Ç–∏ | ‚ùå –ù–µ –æ–±–Ω–∞—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω–æ |
| –ü–æ—Ç–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –≥–æ–Ω–∫–∏ | ‚úÖ –ò—Å–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–æ (DisposeAsync) |
| –û–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ –æ—à–∏–±–æ–∫ | ‚úÖ –•–æ—Ä–æ—à–∞—è |
| Thread-safety | ‚úÖ –•–æ—Ä–æ—à–∞—è |

**–ö–æ–¥ —Å—Ç–∞–±–∏–ª–µ–Ω –∏ –≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤ –∫ production.** –í–Ω—ë—Å –æ–¥–Ω–æ –∏—Å–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –¥–ª—è –ø—Ä–µ–¥–æ—Ç–≤—Ä–∞—â–µ–Ω–∏—è –ø–æ—Ç–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–π –≥–æ–Ω–∫–∏ –ø—Ä–∏ dispose ‚Äî —Ç–µ–ø–µ—Ä—å `DisposeAsync` –∫–æ—Ä—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–Ω–æ –¥–æ–∂–∏–¥–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –∑–∞–≤–µ—Ä—à–µ–Ω–∏—è –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–∞ `OnConnectionChanged` –ø–µ—Ä–µ–¥ –æ—á–∏—Å—Ç–∫–æ–π —Ä–µ—Å—É—Ä—Å–æ–≤.
